title: Dolittle Do Late, Money Over Everything 10.16.19
itunes:title: Dolittle Do Late, Money Over Everything 10.16.19
description:
In episode 496, Jack and Miles are joined Couples Therapy co-host Andy Beckerman to discuss Lebron James' comments about Houston Rockets GM and China, John Bolton firing off, foreign policies worst nightmares coming true, Taco Bell recalling bad meat, Airline food getting an upgrade, the new film Dolittle, Coca Cola Tic Tacs, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. LeBron James Calls Houston Rockets GM ‘Misinformed’ Over Tweet That Could Cost NBA Billions of Dollars—and Twitter Reacts
  2. Trump Suspects a Spiteful John Bolton Is Behind Some of the Ukraine Leaks
  3. John Bolton’s eruption shows that Trump’s defenses are collapsing
  4. Fiona Hill Is Here To F*ck Sh*t Up! And She's Bringing ... John Bolton?
  5. Taco Bell Recalls Beef in 21 States
  6. Umami-Driven Farm-to-Plane Food Has Arrived on Singapore Airlines
  7. WATCH: Dolittle Trailer #1 (2020) | Movieclips Trailers
  8. Trailer: ‘Dolittle’ Could Be The Next ‘John Carter,’ But Universal Will Be Fine If ‘Fast And Furious 9’ And ‘Minions 2’ Are Big Hits
  9. So someone that worked on the new Dr Dolittle movie is posting about it on reddit aaaaaaaaaaaaand.....
  10. An Encounter of Two Icons: Tic Tac® Meets Coca-Cola®
  11. WATCH: Vesce - Zender

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
